author: wn.com
title: Senior Civil Service is like a 'snake pit' that isolates and rejects outsiders, report warns
text: The top of the British Civil Service is like a “snake pit” with a “poisonous environment” that isolates and rejects outsiders, an official report commissioned by the Government has warned. The study, carried out by the former human
